title: Flood warnings for northern Qld amid heavy rain, cyclone builds off west coast | ABC NEWS
description: Meteorologist Jonathan How with the latest on extreme weather conditions impacting parts of Australia. 00:00 - Flood warnings amid heavy rainfall in tropical northern Queensland. 02:10 - Tropical Cyclone Hayley forms off West Australian coast. 03:23 - Fire danger as heat builds across South Australia. title: 'Pesky Aussie laws' comment sparks scrutiny of weight-loss treatment marketing | ABC NEWS
description: A peak eating disorder organisation is raising concerns about weight-loss treatments being prescribed by telehealth companies, like Juniper, which ran a Black Friday sale to promote its services.  In response, Juniper says sales or promotions don't influence a clinician's decision to prescribe medication and it has safeguards in place to protect patients.   #ABCNewsQld #WeightLoss #Health  Subscribe: http://ab.co/1svxLVE Read more here: https://www.abc.net.au/news/2025-12-29/juniper-telehealth-concerns-weight-loss-treatment-glp1/106114626  ABC NEWS provides around the clock coverage of news events as they break in Australia and abroad. title: Bondi hero Ahmed Al Ahmed shares his story | ABC NEWS
description: The man deemed a "hero" after risking his life to save "countless others" during the Bondi Beach terrorist attack has spoken of his determination to protect the innocent. Ahmed Al Ahmed went viral after footage showed him sneaking up behind one of the two gunmen and wrestling a long-barrelled gun away from him. In an exclusive interview with CBS News on Monday, Mr Al Ahmed reflected on the ordeal, in which he was shot multiple times.  ABC NEWS provides around the clock coverage of news events as they break in Australia and abroad. It's news when you want it, from Australia's most trusted news organisation. title: The inner workings of London's most iconic landmark | ABC NEWS
description: In London, clockmakers have been tending to the bongs of Big Ben since 1859. The ABC has had a look inside the landmark ahead of the city's New Year's Eve fireworks display, in which the iconic clock tower plays a crucial part. title: Donald Trump says peace deal between Ukraine and Russia is 'closer than ever' | ABC NEWS
description: US President Donald Trump and his Ukrainian counterpart, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, have presented a united front after talks in Florida on a possible peace plan for Ukraine. But despite the strong language, there's no sign of a breakthrough, and many key details remain unclear. title: New data about Australia's population has been released | Finance Report | ABC NEWS
description: Australia's population has climbed above 27.6 million, with 420,000 new Australians in the quarter to June, 2025. The majority of them arrived by plane, rather than natural increase. Meanwhile, the All Ordinaries fell 0.4% in trading after a four-day break for Christmas. The Australian dollar climbed to 67.2 US cents. Daniel Ziffer has more. title: Bondi hero who wrestled gun from shooter shares his story | ABC NEWS
description: The hero who bravely disarmed one of the shooters during the Bondi terror attack has shared details of his ordeal for the first time. title: The star power and scandal of French icon Brigitte Bardot | ABC NEWS
description: French icon Brigitte Bardot swiftly rose to fame in the 1950s as an era-defining sex symbol. The film icon brought French cinema to the mainstream, but would turn her back on acting later in life and court further controversy as an animal rights activist. Fans are paying tribute to Bardot after her death at the age of 91. title: Albanese stands firm as Bondi victims' families demand royal commission | ABC NEWS
description: Families with loved ones killed or injured in the Bondi Beach attack have penned an open letter to the prime minister, demanding a federal royal commission into the massacre. Anthony Albanese is refusing to budge, instead outlining the terms of a independent review which he argues will be quicker and more effective. title: Father builds son his dream castle home | ABC News
description: They say 'a man's home is his castle', and in south-west Victoria, that's become a reality.  A local builder has built his son a real-life castle, complete with a moat and drawbridge, and it's turning heads in their quiet Warrnambool street.   Olivia Sanders reports. title: Stranded passengers to be rescued after cruise ship ran aground off PNG | ABC NEWS
description: About 80 passengers on board the Coral Adventurer cruise ship will be flown back to Australia after efforts to refloat the vessel were unsuccessful. The cruise ship struck a coral reef off the coast of Papua New Guinea on Saturday morning. Deputy Prime Minister of Papua New Guinea John Rosso joined ABC News from Lae to discuss the incident.
